purpose: The code appears to be collecting system information and sending it to remote servers for tracking purposes.
anomalies: Use of fetch API in Node.js environment instead of https module
Sending system information to external domains without user consent
Use of rejectUnauthorized: false which disables SSL certificate verification
analysis: This code performs malicious data exfiltration by collecting sensitive system information including IP address, hostname, username, and directory paths, then sending this data to third-party domains. The code uses hardcoded C2 server addresses and sends the information via HTTP requests without proper security measures.
conclusion: High risk security vulnerability - data exfiltration malware
